module.name: EndPoint Manager
module.description: Endpoint Manager - COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Supports provisioning of devices.

but is being handled differently when saved from the ucp widget, and the state(audio/visual/none) value wasn't getting saved to the database.
